quote: There are no limitations to the mind except those we acknowledge... – Napoleon Hill
fact: The very first song played on MTV was `Video Killed The Radio Star` by the Buggles.
joke: Feeling pretty proud of myself. The Sesame Street puzzle I bought said 3-5 years, but I finished it in 18 months.
